channel.title: Patch Note on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Patch Note on Home

item.title: v1.0.1
item.description: Following are the improvements released in this patch: Support MacOS dark mode Better support for Safari/Firefox Local resource host Standardize code highlight Support MacOS dark mode A newly designed dark theme that works well in Dark Mode MacOS Mojave. Since it is not a standard technology yet. It will not work for browsers other than Safari. To try it yourself, download Safari Technology Preview then open this site with it.
